site_name: Development Site At 74 To 77 Welbeck Street And 28 To 40
decision_conditions: Preventing noise nuisance re adj props
description: Amendments to planning permission dated 10 February 2021 (RN: 20/02445/FULL) for the: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 01 November 2019 (RN: 18/09467/FULL) for the: DEVELOPMENT SITE AT 74-77 WELBECK STREET AND 28-40 MARYLEBONE LANE - Demolition of the existing building and redevelopment to provide a new building comprising three basement levels, lower ground floor, ground floor level and first to ninth floor levels consisting of hotel (Class C1) with publicly accessible restaurant/bar (Class A3/A4) at ground floor, bar and roof terrace at ninth floor, function/events space at basement levels 2 and 3; and roof level swimming pool, roof level plant and associated works. NAMELY, to allow reconfiguration of the ground floor restaurant/lobby layout and re-introduction of secondary entrance along Henrietta Place; introduction of an additional lift in existing core for Back of House operations; rationalisation of the plant area at Basement 2 Level together with repositioned balcony and additional WC provision; reconfiguration of the Back of House area at Basement 3; reorganisation of guest rooms at Levels 1 - 8; widening of lift overrun to accommodate additional lift in the existing core and to add an additional condition (34) to the planning permisison: "The ground floor al fresco restaurant bar terrace on the Marylebone Lane frontage shall only be used by customers between 06.30 and 23.00 hours."
